document_data.name: Hunters of Vengeance
document_data.mainbody: The '''Hunters of Vengeance''' was an informal order of vigilantes and bounty hunters devoted to [[Hoar]], the Doombringer.
document_data.Base of Operations: The group did not have a specific base of operations, preferring instead to roam the [[Heartlands]] and [[north Faerûn]] to exact their justice.
document_data.Activities: Though few in number, the deeds of the Hunters of Vengeance were spoken of with great admiration, and a bit of dread, among the faithful of Hoar.
